name: SCNParticleModifierStage
desc: Stages of SceneKitâ€™s particle simulation process into which you can insert modifier blocks, used by the addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:) method.

items.name: case preDynamics
items.desc: The stage before SceneKit simulates the motion of particles.

items.name: case postDynamics
items.desc: The stage after SceneKit simulates the motion of particles.

items.name: case preCollision
items.desc: The stage before SceneKit simulates the results of collisions between particles and scene geometry.

items.name: case postCollision
items.desc: The stage after SceneKit simulates the results of collisions between particles and scene geometry.
